entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
